experience.title: Quality Control
description: Wrote an application that duplicates user template worksheets to prevent them from being overwritten and slowing down the review process.
Transitioned team over to daily digital reporting rather than submitting paper logs to provide easier and faster access to data and statistics.
Provided detailed analytics to team lead for easier and more effective reporting.
Wrote SQL queries to assist with importing data into spreadsheets to increase productivity.

experience.title: Creative Manager
description: Designed and produced client websites from start to finish using current technologies and design trends while optimizing content for mobile use.
Consulted clients with design suggestions and hosting recommendations in order to create designs based on client requests and business needs.
